if you want to do character design and such i highly recommend practicing gestural sketching and blocking out parts to refine into a person
Ok, thanks
by practicing that early you will be able to learn a lot more and faster
Blocking out parts?
Cool
also take time to learn perspective- i still struggle with it and its hard to learn now that my brain is a rock
blocking out parts is where you use basic shapes to represent parts of a body
Lol I'd say your looks great
Oh interesting
Ohhh right.
Like how I still use vaguel rectangles to draw hands 'cause I havent bothered learning that yet
if you practice drawing shapes that fit certain areas you can then refine them and your art will be more dynamic and interesting
people who learn these things early in their work are able to generally expand much faster once they grasp them
also makes your work more constant and allows you to replicate your character designs
oh - and NEVER use the excuse "That's just my style"
